## Project thoughts

Do people making more money commute further to work? In this study, I will look at data from my hometown of Buffalo, NY in order to investigate this question. I hypothesize that higher incomes will cause people to choose to live further away from their jobs, and therefor, have longer commute times. I hypothesize this because it is very clear that there is high income disparities between the city of Buffalo (where most jobs are) and the surrounding suburbs.
